title: Nous les Jericho = Sacre Grand-Pere = Dear Old Grandpa
abstract: Note: Based on 'Je m'appelle Jericho' by Catherine Paysan.
description: Jericho is a retired veterinarian who lives on a property in Provence. He invites his grandson and his wife to spend the holidays. Although Marie and Jacques are about to divorce, they agree to disguise it in order to spare Jericho's feelings. Jericho knows better, and realising that the couple is estranged, slyly works to bring about a reconciliation.  Credits: Producer, Pierre Laurent ; director, Jacques Poitrenaud ; writers, Jacques Poitrenaud, Albert Cossery, Maria Suire ; photography, Jean-Marc Ripert ; music, Serge Gainsbourg. Cast: Michel Simon, Marie Dubois, Thalie Fruges, Serge Gainsbourg, Jeanne Helia, Yves Lefebvre, Mary Marquet.
